text:
Michael made his way back to his king's quarters, the book tucked securely under his arm. As he approached the doors, he took a moment to steel himself, hoping that maybe this new knowledge would help him win you back.
He walked into the king's quarters and immediately noticed you. His heart skipped a beat as he saw you, his eyes locking onto your figure.
trans:
Michael retourna dans les appartements de son roi, le livre bien calé sous le bras. Alors qu'il s'approchait des portes, il prit un moment pour reprendre contenance, espérant que ces nouvelles connaissances l'aideraient peut-être à te reconquérir.
Il entra dans les appartements du roi et te remarqua immédiatement. Son cœur a battu la chamade lorsqu'il t'a vue, ses yeux s'arrêtant sur ton visage.
